description:
Sponsored by the FlexiSpot E7 Pro Standing desk: USA: https://bit.ly/45cNfsH - CAN: https://bit.ly/4oe8djs - use code YTE7P50 for $50 off. SiliconDust, the makers of the HDHomerun TV gateway tuner, met with the FCC to talk about how the botched rollout of ATSC 3.0 encryption has impacted their business and customers.
